titleStmt.title: The last famous siege of the city of Rochel together with the Edict of Nantes / written in French by Peter Meruault, a citizen of Rochel who was in the city from the beginning of the siege until the rendition of it.
Journal des choses plus memorables qui se sont passées au dernier siege de la Rochelle. English
titleStmt.author: Mervault, Pierre, b. 1608.
France. Edit de Nantes.

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Journal des choses plus memorables qui se sont passées au dernier siege de la Rochelle.
Running title: The history of the siege of Rochel.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Dublin University.
